snippet: Members of the Danish String Quartet, acutely attuned to one another, didn’t appear to be on autopilot for even a millisecond, with every nuance, phrase and gesture beautifully wrought.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performanc by Danish String Quartet at Scandinavia House.
lead_paragraph: Members of the Danish String Quartet, acutely attuned to one another, didn’t appear to be on autopilot for even a millisecond, with every nuance, phrase and gesture beautifully wrought.

headline.seo: Danish String Quartet at Scandinavia House
